snippet: The alarms went off inside the train that crashed last week in northwestern Spain moments before it derailed, prompting the panicked driver to activate the brakes three times, an examination revealed.
abstract: Examination of black boxes reveal that alarms went off inside train that crashed in northwestern Spain moments before it derailed, prompting the panicked driver to activate the brakes three times even as he talked on the telephone with another employee.
lead_paragraph: The alarms went off inside the train that crashed last week in northwestern Spain moments before it derailed, prompting the panicked driver to activate the brakes three times, an examination revealed.

headline.main: Spain: Alarms Warned Train’s Driver Before Accident
headline.print_headline: Spain: Alarms Warned Train’s Driver Before Accident
